com.icodici.universa.contract.services

Interface ImmutableEnvironment

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MutableEnvironment
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SlotImmutableEnvironment, SlotMutableEnvironment

    public interface ImmutableEnvironment
    The environment accessible to readonly NodeContract methods, e.g. NContract.query(ImmutableEnvironment, String, Binder) and NContract.onRevoked(ImmutableEnvironment) and like. Note tha the envidonment associated with NContract must be destroyed when the NContract is revoked.

    • Method Detail

      • getContract

        <T extends Contract> T getContract()
        There is always and instance of the contract available.
        Type Parameters:
        T - contract type
        Returns:
        the contract that this environment is created for.

      • get

        <T,U extends T> T get(java.lang.String keyName,
                      U defaultValue)
        Read access to the instance server-size key-value store. Note that if the store is not created, it always return default value, this is not an error.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        U -
        Parameters:
        keyName - key name
        defaultValue - value to return if the KV store is empty
        Returns:
        the stored value or the default value

      • instanceCreatedAt

        @NonNull java.time.ZonedDateTime instanceCreatedAt()
        The instance when this contract was created at THIS NODE (calling Node). This is effectively the time when the node has started processing the contract, the Ledger stored, e.g. StateRecord.createdAt will be the right value.
        Returns:

      • storageSubscriptions

        java.lang.Iterable<ContractStorageSubscription> storageSubscriptions()
